thread.title: Egypt Court Orders Two Mubarak Sons Freed from Prison
thread.title_full: Egypt Court Orders Two Mubarak Sons Freed from Prison - WSJ

author: Dahlia Kholaif
title: Egypt Court Orders Two Mubarak Sons Freed from Prison
text:
CAIRO—An Egyptian court on Monday ordered the release from jail of Hosni Mubarak’s two sons, as the country’s courts continued to undo punishments handed down to allies of the former Egyptian president.
Cairo’s Criminal Court found Gamal and Alaa Mubarak guilty in May of embezzling 21 million Egyptian pounds, or ($2,700,000), that was allocated for the renovation of Egypt’s presidential palaces between 2002 and 2011. They were... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
